div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 5 Eleusis (E. of Telesterion), Attica, c. 1883 (379) Burial: c. 520-500 B.C. (T) Contents: 7-8 AR. From excavations Eretria:1 didr. (cow/octopus; pl.) 1 hemidr. (cow/octopus) Athens: 5 Wappenm. fr. 1 hemidr. (female hd. on rev., as Seltman pl. 22) (Nearby a Wappenm. tetradr. with pan- ther hd. reverse) Disposition: unknown KÃ¶hler, AM 1884, pp. 357-8 Seltman, Athens, p. 146
